Lawful Good: Creatures that endeavor to do the right thing as expected by society. Someone who fights injustice and protects the innocent without hesitation.
Neutral Good: Creatures that do the best they can, working within rules but not feeling bound by them. A kindly person who helps others according to their needs.
Chaotic Good: Creatures that act as their conscience directs with little regard for what others expect. A rebel who waylays a cruel baron's tax collectors and uses the stolen money to help the poor.
Lawful Neutral: Creatures that act in accordance with law, tradition, or personal codes. Someone who follows a disciplined rule of life and isn't swayed by the demands of those in need or the temptations of evil.
Neutral: Creatures that prefer to avoid moral questions and don't take sides, doing what seems best at the time. Someone who's bored by moral debate.
Chaotic Neutral: Creatures that follow their whims, valuing personal freedom above all else. A scoundrel who wanders the land living by their wits.
Lawful Evil: Creatures that methodically take what they want within the limits of a code of tradition, loyalty, or order. An aristocrat exploiting citizens while scheming for power.
Neutral Evil: Creatures that are untroubled by the harm they cause as they pursue their desires. A criminal who robs and murders as they please.
Chaotic Evil: Creatures that act with arbitrary violence, spurred by hatred or bloodlust. A villain pursuing schemes of vengeance and havoc.
